main event: A bright ball of fire was observed over Carswell AFB, Texas for 10-15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was white, approximately the size of a baseball, The sighting lasted for 10-15 minutes, The object traveled rapidly and silently with no discernible sound, Observers described the object as having a red tail, The sighting did not warrant further investigation due to insufficient evidence.
witness description: Mr. Hornaday, T/SGT tower watch supervisor, A/1C control tower operator
